# Gatsby's Obsidian blog starter

## Quick start

- link your obsidian vault to `./content`
```sh
ln -s /path/to/obsidian/vault/folder/ ./content/
```
- replace all `/content/knowledgebase` to `/content/your_vault_folder_name`

- `npm run dev`
